person.persName: Thomas S. Porter (Grant County, KY teacher)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, schoolteacher and postmaster. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Merrill Porter. School teacher in Boone County in 1850. Common school teacher in Grant County in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Grant County in 1860.
